mabs-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the MABS extension.
mabs-setup-intro:
Welcome to the MABS configuration page.

To set up MABS, you need to make sure the repository directory exists and is writable by the webserver.  To change the repository directory, set <tt>$MABSRepo</tt> in your <tt>LocalSettings.php</tt> file
mabs-repo-depo: Path relateive to the wiki-root to the MABS repository
mabs-dev-needed: The developer needs to implement a class for the '''<tt>$1</tt>''' page.
mabs-no-wizard-step-list: No steps given for this wizard
mabs-dev-needed-step-list: The developer needs to provide a list of steps for the '''<tt>$1</tt>''' page.
mabs-dev-needed-step: The developer needs to implement the '''<tt>$1</tt>''' step for the '''<tt>$2</tt>''' page.
mabs-dev-needed-success: The developer needs to implement what happens on successful form completion for the '''<tt>$1</tt>''' step on the '''<tt>$2</tt>''' page.
mabs-dev-needed-callback: The developer needs to implement a callback for the '''<tt>$1</tt>''' step on the '''<tt>$2</tt>''' page.
mabs-config-gitdir-not-writable: The git directory ($1) exists, but is not writable.
mabs-config-not-exists: The config file ($2) does not exist.  The repository needs to be initialized
mabs-config-not-writable: The config file ($2) is not writable.  Please make it writable.
mabs-config-fix-problems: Please fix these problems before continuing. When you think they are fixed, submit this form.
mabs-config-complete: Continue on to import the wiki
mabs-config-start-over: The repository still needs to be configured
mabs-import-intro: During this process the current wiki will be imported.  First, a custom wiki remote ([https://github.com/hexmode/mediawiki-git-remote git-remote-mediawiki]) is set up, connectivity is tested, and the import is performed.
mabs-config-remote: This wiki is the remote for the repository we are setting up
mabs-config-origin-branch: This origin for this wiki will be the master branch
mabs-config-sitename-mismatch: The API returned an unexpected value: $1 != $2
mabs-config-import-ready: The repository is empty and ready for import
mabs-config-import-fetch-error:
Git reported a problem while attempting to import: 
$1
